programme.title: President Clinton's first 15 months
programme.short_synopsis: A potential crisis in Haiti, and President Clinton's ability to deal with conflict abroad.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Clinton's first 15 months in office and the challenges he faces both at home, and abroad including, the looming crisis in Haiti are reflected on by Alistair Cooke.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
